title: Statement by Vice President Biden on Economic Indicators Released Today | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 26, 2009

 



Statement by Vice President Biden on Economic Indicators Released Today




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Vice President  __________________________________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                                                 June 26, 2009  Statement by Vice President Biden on Economic Indicators Released Today   "We have a long way to go on the road to recovery, but I am encouraged by the news today that consumer confidence has continued to improve, spending rose last month, and Recovery Act benefits – like the $250 relief payments and the tax credits – boosted disposable personal income by $17 billion in May.  We won’t be satisfied until we begin to see job growth, but these are early signs that the Recovery Act is beginning to do exactly what it should – provide stability for hard-hit families and businesses and create the conditions necessary for our economic recovery."
